title: Landing page loads and shows core hero/branding content
description: Verifies the landing page renders successfully and the primary brand messaging is visible on initial load.

title: Scroll to and view the "Sua jornada estelar" (Journey) section
description: Verifies the user can scroll the landing page and reach the Journey section content.

steps.description: Verify text "Sua jornada estelar" is visible
Verify element "section" containing text "Sua jornada estelar" is visible

title: Scroll to and view the Client Testimonials section
description: Verifies the testimonials area is reachable and visible when scrolling the landing page.

steps.description: Verify element "section" containing text "Client Testimonials" is visible

title: End-to-end scroll journey: Journey section then Testimonials section
description: Verifies a complete visitor flow through key sections in sequence on the landing page.

steps.description: Verify text "Sua jornada estelar" is visible

title: Visual aesthetic presence: glassmorphism and neon-like elements appear
description: Verifies the page presents visible dark-premium visual treatment using glass/overlay and neon-accent elements.

steps.description: Verify element "glass" styled card/panel is visible
Verify element "neon" accent/glow element is visible
Verify element "glass" styled card/panel is visible

title: Animations present during scroll without requiring performance validation
description: Verifies animated interactions appear as the user scrolls through the landing page (without measuring FPS).

steps.description: Verify element "animated" section content is visible
Verify element "animated" transition or motion content is visible

title: Successful contact form submission shows confirmation message without page reload
description: Verifies that submitting valid required fields replaces the contact form with a confirmation message on the same page.

title: Empty required fields show inline validation errors
description: Verifies that leaving Nome and Contato empty triggers visible inline validation errors and blocks submission.

title: Only Nome filled still requires Contato and does not submit
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when Contato is empty and shows a required-field error for Contato.

title: Only Contato filled still requires Nome and does not submit
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when Nome is empty and shows a required-field error for Nome.

title: Confirmation message appears in the contact section after submission
description: Verifies the success message is shown within the contact area and the form is no longer presented after submit.

steps.description: Scroll to the contact section heading

title: Required-field error clears after entering a missing value and resubmitting
description: Verifies that a required-field validation error can be resolved by entering the missing data and submitting successfully.

title: Desktop fixed navigation is visible with backdrop-blur styling cues
description: Verifies the desktop header navigation is present and appears as a fixed, premium blurred menu container on the landing page.

steps.description: Verify element "site header / top navigation bar" is visible
Verify element "desktop navigation menu links" is visible
Verify element "header background / blurred backdrop area behind the menu" is visible
Verify element "mobile menu icon (hamburger)" is not visible

title: Desktop menu anchor smoothly scrolls to Serviços section
description: Verifies clicking a desktop navigation anchor scrolls to the Serviços section and the target section is visibly in focus.

steps.description: Click on the desktop menu link labeled "Serviços"

title: Desktop menu anchor smoothly scrolls to Contato section
description: Verifies clicking a desktop navigation anchor scrolls to the Contato section and the target section becomes visible.

steps.description: Click on the desktop menu link labeled "Contato"

title: Desktop navigation remains available after scrolling to a section
description: Verifies the navigation header remains visible after navigating to an in-page anchor, consistent with a fixed menu.

steps.description: Click on the desktop menu link labeled "Serviços"
Verify element "site header / top navigation bar" is visible
Verify element "desktop navigation menu links" is visible

title: Mobile overlay menu opens from the mobile menu icon
description: Verifies the mobile menu icon opens the overlay navigation and the overlay contents are visible.

Click on the mobile menu icon (hamburger)
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is visible
Verify element "mobile overlay menu links" is visible

title: Mobile overlay menu link closes overlay and scrolls to Serviços
description: Verifies selecting a link in the mobile overlay closes the overlay and navigates to the Serviços section.

steps.description: Click on the mobile menu icon (hamburger)
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is visible
Click on the overlay menu link labeled "Serviços"
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is not visible

title: Mobile overlay menu link closes overlay and scrolls to Contato
description: Verifies selecting a link in the mobile overlay closes the overlay and navigates to the Contato section.

steps.description: Click on the mobile menu icon (hamburger)
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is visible
Click on the overlay menu link labeled "Contato"
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is not visible

title: Negative: Mobile menu overlay fails to open when tapping menu icon (unresponsive state)
description: Validates the failure mode where the mobile overlay menu does not open and remains inaccessible after interaction.

steps.description: Verify element "mobile menu icon (hamburger)" is visible
Click on the mobile menu icon (hamburger)
Verify element "mobile overlay menu" is not visible
Verify element "mobile menu icon (hamburger)" is visible

title: Scroll reveal adds reveal classes when elements enter viewport
description: Verifies content elements visually transition into view as the page is scrolled down, indicating reveal behavior is triggered.

steps.description: Scroll down to the next content section below the hero
Verify element "first reveal-on-scroll content block" is visible
Verify the content block appears in its revealed state (not hidden/collapsed)

title: Multiple reveal elements trigger as user continues scrolling
description: Verifies additional elements reveal progressively as they enter the viewport during continued scrolling.

steps.description: Scroll down to a mid-page section containing multiple content blocks
Verify element "a reveal-on-scroll content block" is visible
Scroll down to the next section where additional blocks should reveal
Verify element "another reveal-on-scroll content block" is visible
Verify the newly reached block appears in its revealed state (not hidden/collapsed)

title: Landing page provides SEO metadata for title and description
description: Verifies the landing page exposes basic SEO metadata in visible page content and title.

title: Open Graph / social preview content is reflected by visible hero messaging
description: Validates that the visible hero copy aligns with what would be expected for social preview title/description configuration.

title: Keyboard navigation: Tab reaches primary interactive elements in the header/hero
description: Ensures key call-to-action and navigation elements are reachable by keyboard and show a clear focus target.

title: Keyboard navigation: Enter activates a focused call-to-action without requiring a mouse
description: Verifies a focused interactive control can be activated using the keyboard to progress the user journey.

title: Screen-reader-friendly structure: semantic landmarks are present
description: Checks that the page uses semantic landmarks to support screen reader navigation (visibly present structural elements).

title: Material Symbols/icons do not replace critical text labels for CTAs
description: Ensures iconography does not remove essential visible labels needed for accessibility and comprehension.

title: Edge case: validate remediation requirement when metadata is missing (manual negative check)
description: Documents the expected failure mode when social metadata is absent; verifies visible indicators that metadata configuration is incomplete cannot be confirmed from the UI alone.
